c1e001.title: E001: Meet our Heroes
c1e001.description: We meet the players, they meet Henk, Wip, Oril, and a gang ready to kick their ass. The gang lacks the skill to kick their ass tho, and instead a few go running away. As the characters revel in their accomplishments they realize Oril is missing, only to find him knocked out in the alleyway.

c1e002.title: E002: Hot Pursuit
c1e002.description: The gang chases down a lone goon evading them. He's got a big lead and darts into a service entrance in the mall. Eldin hijacks a truck, O'Fearain commondeers a car, and the rest hoof it. When the thief is apprehended and interrogated he's met with a shocking demise.

c1e003.title: E003: Invisible Assailant
c1e003.description: A lightning ball thrown from the darkness kills the captive. Constables arrive on scene and are persuaded to arrest the mage Avozahar. The party heads over to the Dogwood Precinct to explain the chaos.

c1e004.title: E004: Police Ineptitude
c1e004.description: John VonDeMort assists the party in setting up their story, Inspector Elaias brings in a truth syrum contraption, and the party is broken out of the precinct by none other than Avozahar's henches

c1e005.title: E005: Suspicious Contacts
c1e005.description: The party attempts to learn more about what weeds they're in. They learn of the Humoric Elements and set out to collect one more (the Brown Mold Heart) from Hardfort Keep in the North

c1e006.title: E006: Road Trip
c1e006.description: The Players road trip up to Hardfort, but trade some money at a rest stop on the way.

c1e007.title: E007: Road Rage
c1e007.description: Under attack on the road, the team trucks through a biker gang and on to Hardfort meeting the kindly lady at the tourism bureau.

c1e008.title: E008: Hardfort Fairgrounds
c1e008.description: The party gets to the Hardfort fairgrounds and signs up for a tour of the keep. Konan & The Bardbarians make a name as The Bard to Beat

c1e009.title: E009: Haunted Forest of Hardfort Keep
c1e009.description: After purchasing a ticket to the Haunted Forest tour the party winds through the forest surrounding the keep learning lore about the Garnetsend family
